definition: firm and indomitable (idiom); tenacious and unyielding

sentences.english: Life should be as hard and tough as a rubber ball.
sentences.chinese: 生命应如橡胶球一样坚韧。

sentences.english: He is ensanguined battlefield, tough and castiron.
Unreinforced, Super Tough polybutylene terephthalate resin for injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 注坯模型的未加强，超级坚韧聚丁烯对苯二酸盐树脂。

sentences.english: If encounter without, although fine but can be trapped large prey, tenacity and clinking.
sentences.chinese: 若遇若无，虽细却可以困住很大的猎物，坚韧无比。

sentences.english: Elite Sanshou players were more pliable than the general players.
sentences.chinese: 优秀散打运动员比一般运动员的坚韧性与总分更好。

sentences.english: Forceful speakers usually have a strong personality.
sentences.chinese: 有说服力的报告人通常都性格坚韧。

sentences.english: With perseverance one surmounts all difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 只要坚韧不拔，就能战胜万难。

sentences.english: I like euphrates poplar because they symbolize the resilience of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢胡杨，它是中华民族坚韧不拔精神的象征。

sentences.english: Polyesters are less brittle than epoxies, but not as flexible or tough as urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯没有环氧树脂发脆，但也没有聚氨酯的坚韧性。

sentences.english: For the case of real time control, reliability and robustness are emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 对于实时控制，强调了可靠性和坚韧性。

sentences.english: Eskimos use seal to make tough threads.
sentences.chinese: 爱斯基摩人用海豹皮做坚韧的线。

sentences.english: Obstinate are the trammels, but my heart aches when I try to break them.
sentences.chinese: 罗网是坚韧的，若要撕裂它们，我又会心痛。

sentences.english: Obstinate are the trammels, but my heart aches when I try to break them.
sentences.chinese: 罗网是坚韧的，但是要撕破它的时候我又要心痛。

sentences.english: They are tough and rubbery, hard to cut.
sentences.chinese: 它坚韧并富有弹性，很难砍断。

sentences.english: For Popper's criterion ignores the remarkable tenacity of scientific theories.
sentences.chinese: 因为波普尔的标准忽视了科学理论明显的坚韧性。

sentences.english: God's love is patient, persistent, and persevering.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的爱充满耐心，持续不断并且坚韧不拔。

definition: firm and indomitable (idiom); tenacious and unyielding
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
